text: Quit Playing Games (with My Heart) is a Pop/R&B; song by American boy band Backstreet Boys. It was released in October 1996. It was also recorded in 1995. It is from their debut international studio album. It was also later released on their debut US studio album. It reached number 1 in Austria, Czechia, Germany, Lithuania and Switzerland. It also reached number 2 in the United Kingdom and the United States' Billboard Hot 100. Also, it reached number 7 in the Netherlands. Because of this song reaching number 2 on the Billboard Hot 100, it makes it their most successful on that billboard. It also sold 2 million copies in the US. ==References== Category:1996 songs Category:Backstreet Boys songs Category:Pop ballads
